title: How do I get Android Q/10 to behave like Android 9 when tapping on a downloaded file notification?
content:
In 9 when I tapped on a downloaded file notification, the file would automatically open with the appropriate application

In Q/10 the chrome downloaded file list comes up and I have to tap on the file to display it

I have not been able to find the setting to change this behavior back to the previous behavior

Thanx
